channel.title: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!
channel.description: Please someone tell me or help me fix my voule auto restarter. It wont restart my server :(. I need this please help me. :([br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 10:39:10 AM[/size][hr]bump :S

item.title: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

ok how long does it take be4 server restarts with voule?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 06:31:18 PM[/size][hr]also only me it wont restart my server it just sits there flashing a lil white underscore …

item.title: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

master_montage:

if he/she dowloads mine its sooooo… easy to use, all you have to do is click on the voule that looks like the runserver.bat, and it does everything for you

If its soooooo easy, then why can’t you do it? I gave you a solution, its your choice to use it or not.

NVM, wrong person… Thought you were the same guy. Voule still sucks for rs btw.

item.source: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!

item.title: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here use my method. Easier.

put this into a batch file name it restart or whatever you like.

@PING -n 1800 127.0.0.1 >nul tskill java /a @start .\server.bat @Goto end

then download tskill.exe and place it in your server folder.
I have always hated that server restarter your using, I would
only use that if i wa running a WOW private server or a
counter strike server etc etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!

item.title: Why dosent my voule auto restarter work?!
item.dc:creator: @master_montage master_montage
item.description:
@master_montage wrote:

ok, this might work… i uploaded my voule…

Download this… http://rapidshare.com/files/43691687/voule.rar.html

After you have downloaded it place both of those file or what ever they are in you server folder, then just click on the voule autorestarter that looks like your runserver.bat!

                              I hope that helps!

Read full topic
